name: Hunt Animal For Survival
description:
People who love to hunt as alone in dangerous jungle, this Hunt Animal For Survival first person sniper shooting game is best for these people. where you don't have a team & you have to do it all alone. Use your gun to shoot these dangerous animals and survival in jungle. You going to have the different accurate experience with every wild animal shoot. There are some furious wildlife creature, they always attack the hunters.

Hunt Animal For Survival: Features
Dangerous Realistic Forest Environment
Hunting among different animals
Multiple levels against every animal.
Best Sniper Shooting Experience in Forest
Superb design
